title: Faith
question: Have I denied that I was a Catholic, or openly expressed my disbelief in any doctrine of the Catholic faith?

title: Faith
question: Have I affiliated myself, even for a short time, with a non-Catholic sec or religious body?

title: Faith
question: Have I suggested or encouraged doubts about the Catholic faith in the minds of others?

title: Faith
question: Have I seriously expressed hte opinion that all religions are equally good or equally true or equally pleasing to God?

title: Faith
question: Have I neglected to settle, by reading studying, consulting, etc., serious doubts about my faith, when such neglect was evidently leading to a lss of faith?

title: Faith
question: Have I, without the necessary permission, read or kept or given to others forbidden books, such as Protestant Bibles, books on the Index of Prohibited Publications, books that pretend or profess to disprove the truth of the Catholic faith or that profess to prove the truth of a religion contrary to my faith?

title: Faith
question: Have I joined a secret society forbidden by the laws of the Church, such as the Masons, the Oddfellows, etc.?

title: Faith
question: Have I taken part in the Protestant church service?

title: Faith
question: Have I contributed to the advancement of a non-Catholic religious sec or movement as such?

title: Faith
question: Have I consulted a fortune-teller in the serious belief that I could learn something about the future, or made others think that I could tell their future when I know that there was no adequate natural means of doing so?

title: Faith
question: Have I attended a spiritualistic seance?

title: Faith
question: Have I planned to marry, or actually pretend to enter the state of marriage, before minister, or a judge, or a civil magistrate? Have I approved of other Catholics doing this or stood up for them when they did it?

title: Faith
question: Have I, without the necessary permission or reasons, sent my children ot an non-Catholic grade school, or approved of other Catholics doing so? Or without serious reason approve by the diocesan authorities, to a non-Catholic high school or university? Or have I done theses things without making any provision to safeguard the faith of my children?

title: Hope
question: Have I said or seriously thought that God was too merciful to condemn anyone to hell, and that, therefore, despite my serious sins, I would surely be saved?

title: Hope
question: Have I continued in a habit of mortal sin because I believe that some day I would certainly have the grace to repent and be forgiven?

title: Hope
question: Have I committed a mortal sin just because I expected God to forgive me in confession afterwards?

title: Hope
question: Have I neglected saying any prayer whatsoever for as long as a month at a time

title: Hope
question: Have I refused to pray in a grave temptation because I did not want God to help me overcome it?

title: Hope
question: Have I deliberately entered a serious and unnecessary occasion of sin, thinking that God would miraculously preserve me from sin or graciously forgive me if I fell?

title: Hope
question: Have I induced others to commit a sin by telling them that would forgive them afterwards?

title: Hope
question: Have I said that I did not believe in eternal hell?

title: Hope
question: Have I said or thought that it was impossible for me to overcome a certain passion or sinful habit?

title: Hope
question: Have I believe that because my sins in the past were so numerous or so terrible, I could not expect God to forgive me?

title: Hope
question: Have I quit going to Mass or praying because of the thought, "It doesn't do any good"?

title: Hope
question: Have I seriously complained that God sent me more trails that it was possible for me to bear?

title: Hope
question: Have I stopped praying for the grace to avoid sin and save my soul because God did not grant me a certain material favor for which I prayed?

title: Hope
question: Have I given up trying to overcome interior temptation because God would not take the temptation away?

title: Hope
question: Have I used poverty as a reason for committing certain serious sins, because Id id not believe that God could give me any material aid?

title: Hope
question: Have I scoffed at the joys of heaven, saying I would prefer to have heaven here on earth

title: Love Of God
question: Have I neglected to fulfill the percept of going to confession at least once a year?

title: Love Of God
question: Have I failed to observe the law which commands me to receive Holy Communion during the Paschal season?

title: Love Of God
question: Have I missed Mass on Sunday or a holyday without a sufficient reason?

title: Love Of God
question: Have I, as a mother or father or guardian, caused or permitted my children who are above the age of reason, to miss Mass on Sundays or holydays of obligation?

title: Love Of God
question: Have I induced others to miss Mass on Sundays, or approved of their so doing so

title: Love Of God
question: Have I without reason come late to Mass, missing the Offertory, or have I left before the Communion of the Mass?

title: Love Of God
question: Have I tried to do serious bodily injury to nay person consecrated to God?

title: Love Of God
question: Have I engaged in servile, work such as gardening, building, repairing, sewing, laundering, etc., for more than two hours on the Lord's Day, when there was no urgent reason for doing so?

title: Love Of God
question: Have I broken a serious vow made to God, by which I had bound myself under pain of mortal sin?

title: Love Of God
question: Have I committed a sacrilege by receiving the Sacrament of Communion, Confirmation, or Matrimony while the state of mortal sin

title: Love Of God
question: Have I tried to lead a person bound to God by the vow of chastity into sin again his vow?

title: Love Of God
question: Have I stolen something valuable from the House of God, whether an article used in divine services or money given to the Church?

title: Love Of God
question: Have I deliberately mocked or made fun of the Sacrament of the Mass or any of the liturgical functions?

title: Reverence for God
question: Have I denied any of the attributes of God e.g. saying that He is not all-powerful, all-merciful, all-just, etc. ?

title: Reverence for God
question: Have I said that I did not believe in God's providence, either directly by denying that He watches over all who love Him,or indirectly by saying that it is necessary to sin to avoid certain hardships?

title: Reverence for God
question: Have I spoken with contempt, of God, or Christ, or of the Holy Eucharist, or of the Passion of Christ?

title: Reverence for God
question: Have I deliberately expressed the wish that there was no God, so that I could in without fear of punishment?

title: Reverence for God
question: Have I accused God of cruelty, injustice, discrimination against me, because of some sorrow I had to bear?

title: Reverence for God
question: Have I wished evil to God - for example, that He would be forgotten by men and offended more frequently?

title: Reverence for God
question: Have I spoken slightingly or contemptuously of the Mother of God, or of the saints, or of monks, nuns, priests as such?

title: Reverence for God
question: Have I ridiculed the Sacrament of the Mass or any other holy ceremony?

title: Reverence for God
question: Have I said that God did not and could not have inspired the Bible, or that there are things in the Bible that need not be believed?

title: Reverence for God
question: Have I said that Christ did not found the Church, or that He has not preserved it from error?

title: Reverence for God
question: Have I said that God expects too much of an individual by imposing the ten commandments on him?

title: Reverence for God
question: Have I stated that any one of the commandments of God or precepts of the Church cannot be observed by ordinary folk?

title: Reverence for God
question: Have I said that I owed nothing to God and therefore did not need to go to Church or practice any religion?

title: Reverence for God
question: Have I denied the miracles of our Lord, or attributed them to deceit or natural causes?

title: Reverence for God
question: Have I sworn falsely at a public trail, deliberately telling a falsehood when I had taken an oath to tell the truth?

title: Reverence for God
question: Have I lied about important matters to which I had to swear in drawing up a statement or answering a questionnaire, e.g., pretaining to insurance, position, taxes, etc.?

title: Reverence for God
question: Have I sworn to God that I would keep a certain promise or perform a certain work when I did not intend to do so at all?

title: Reverence for God
question: Have I deliberately called upon God to witness the truth of a lie that I told someone in private?

title: Reverence for God
question: Have I sworn to God that I would do something gravely unjust, like defrauding a neighbor, taking revenge, hurting someone?

title: Reverence for God
question: Have I deliberately cursed a human being, which means seriously wishing or asking that God condemn his soul to hell or visit some other grave misfortune upon him?

title: Reverence for God
question: Have I twisted the words of Christ or of the Bible into an obscene or evil form?

title: Reverence for God
question: Have I, as a parent or guardian, blasphemed or cursed or sworn falsely before my children or even to my children? Have I encouraged other to commit any of the above sins?

title: Love of Neighbor - Positive Obligations
question: Have I, over a long period, refused to give any alms for the relief of the needy, even though I had many opportunities and sufficient means without depriving myself or my family of the necessities of life?

title: Love of Neighbor - Positive Obligations
question: Have I, on un-Christian principles, refused to give any aid to missionaries working for the salvation of abandoned souls, though I could have given without great sacrifice?

title: Love of Neighbor - Positive Obligations
question: As a doctor or a nurse, have I refused to give my needed services to someone in extreme danger of death because I knew there was no hope of being paid?

title: Love of Neighbor - Positive Obligations
question: Have I demanded gravely exorbitant and unreasonable fees from those who needed my services?

title: Love of Neighbor - Positive Obligations
question: Have I deliberately permitted a person to die without a priest and without religious ministrations?

title: Love of Neighbor - Positive Obligations
question: Have I, out of human respect or fear of what others might think, failed to assist the dying spiritually when I knew they needed my help?

title: Love of Neighbor - Positive Obligations
question: Have I squandered or given away money outside my home to the extent that it left my immediate family in want of necessary things?

title: Love of Neighbor - Positive Obligations
question: Have I refused to remind someone of the danger of his state when I knew that that person had committed a mortal sin and that my warning alone would probably awaken repentance

title: Love of Neighbor - Positive Obligations
question: As a husband or wife have I made no effort to prevent mortal sins of my partner?

title: Love of Neighbor - Positive Obligations
question: As a superior or one in authority have I neglected my duty of preventing those in my charge from committing mortal sin, or correcting them after they had fallen?

title: Love of Neighbor - Positive Obligations
question: Have I failed to report to someone in authority the certain sins of a neighbor, which I knew were doing harm to innocent persons or to the community as a whole?

title: Love of Neighbor - Positive Obligations
question: Have I done nothing to prevent the circulation of obscene books and magazines when I had the opportunity?

title: Love of Neighbor - Positive Obligations
question: As a public official, have I permitted evil persons, such as abortionists, dope-peddlers, obscene book-dealers to continue their illegal and immoral practices?

title: Love of Neighbor - Positive Obligations
question: Have I permitted another to suffer grave injustice or mistreatment when my authority or influence could have prevented it?

title: Love of Neighbor - Positive Obligations
question: Have I refused in my heart to forgive a person who has injured me?

title: Love of Neighbor - Positive Obligations
question: Have I over a considerable period of time refused to talk to or acknowledge someone who has wronged me?

title: Love of Neighbor - Positive Obligations
question: When I myself was guilty of doing evil against my neighbor, have I refused in word or in deed to show that I was sorry and wished to be forgiven?

title: Love of Neighbor - Positive Obligations
question: When mutual offense was given between myself and another, have I refused to make any advances toward reconciliation unless he other person made them first?

title: Love of Neighbor - Positive Obligations
question: Have, I, by silence or approval, failed to prevent he serious defamation of another's character when I could have done so?

title: Love of Neighbor - Negative Obligations
question: Have I hated others, which means actually and deliberately whishing them grave hard on earth or the loss of their souls?

title: Love of Neighbor - Negative Obligations
question: Have I callously rejoiced over the serious misfortunes that came to others, not because they might be turned away from sin thereby, but because it pleased me to see them suffer?

title: Love of Neighbor - Negative Obligations
question: Have I sought opportunities to revenge myself on others by inflicting serious pain on them?

title: Love of Neighbor - Negative Obligations
question: Have I slandered others, i.e., attributed serious sins to them which they did not commit, or of which I had no evidence?

title: Love of Neighbor - Negative Obligations
question: Have I ruined the reputation of others, telling their secret serious sins to persons who could not otherwise have known and who had no reason to know these sins?

title: Love of Neighbor - Negative Obligations
question: Have I lied in order that I might gain from another's serious loss?

title: Love of Neighbor - Negative Obligations
question: Have I directly desired and tried to load another into sin, because I wanted to turn him away from religion?

title: Love of Neighbor - Negative Obligations
question: Have I induced another to sin to gratify my own passions?

title: Love of Neighbor - Negative Obligations
question: have I tried to induce another person to sin seriously, even though I did not succeed?

title: Love of Neighbor - Negative Obligations
question: Have I advised or otherwise induced person to practice contraception, or abortion, or to get a divorce and remarry?

title: Love of Neighbor - Negative Obligations
question: Have I thought employees or others under my supervision how to cheat in business for the sake of profit?

title: Love of Neighbor - Negative Obligations
question: Have I sold or given away obscene magazines, bad  pictures, or contraceptives, or other thing designed for sin?

title: Love of Neighbor - Negative Obligations
question: have I destroyed or lessened the faith of others by speaking contemptuously about religion, or the Church, or priests, etc.?

title: Love of Neighbor - Negative Obligations
question: Have I advised or encouraged Catholics not to send their children to Catholic school?

title: Love of Neighbor - Negative Obligations
question: Have I urged another to keep on drinking until he became intoxicated?

title: Love of Neighbor - Negative Obligations
question: Have I sold liquor to persons when I know they were already intoxicated and would keep on drinking, or when I know they were about to become intoxicated?

title: Love of Neighbor - Negative Obligations
question: Have I committed a mortal sin that did not involve others, knowing, however, that my example would probably lead other to do the same?

title: Love of Neighbor - Negative Obligations
question: Have I given occasion to evil thoughts in others by gravely immodest dress, looks, words, or actions?

title: Love of Neighbor - Negative Obligations
question: Have I cooperated with another in the commission of a mortal sin - for example, of stealing, by providing the necessary means or the necessary occasion?

title: Love of Neighbor - Negative Obligations
question: Have I helped doctors perform illegal operations, or businessmen to consummate unjust transactions, or heretics to spread false doctrines?

title: Love of Neighbor - Negative Obligations
question: Have I assisted at the invalid marriage of a Catholic before a judge or minister, or taken part in any non-Catholic religious ceremony?

title: Love of Neighbor - Negative Obligations
question: Have I deprived an unborn child of its right to life by causing an abortion, or paying for an abortion, or coorperating in it in some other way?

title: Justice
question: Have I directly stolen anything of considerable value from another, i.e., either 1) of great value to the person involved, as one of tow dollars might be to poor person, or five dollars might be to a person of more means; or 2) of great value in itself and in the common estimation of society, so that even if it were taken from a corporation or a very rich person, it would still be considered a grave injustice?

title: Justice
question: Have I stolen a considerable sum of money or valuable articles from a church, which adds sacrilege to the sin of theft?

title: Justice
question: Have I stolen small sums from a person or corporation with the intention of continuing the practice over a period of time?

title: Justice
question: Have I joined with others in stealing, each one agreeing to take a little, but the total amounting to a grave sum?

title: Justice
question: Have I failed to make restitution for grave thefts when I could have done so?

title: Justice
question: Have I accepted stolen good from another, either as gift or a sale, to be used by myself or sold again?

title: Justice
question: Have I wilfully injured the property of another to a serious extent?

title: Justice
question: Have I refused to pay for another person's property that I have wilfully and seriously damaged?

title: Justice
question: Have I defrauded another of something valuable, to which he had a right, by telling a lie or giving false testimony, or secretly changing a contract or a will?

title: Justice
question: Have I acquired the property of another through deceit, lying, misrepresentation, etc., or sold a bad investment in the same way?

title: Justice
question: Have I found something of considerable value and kept it when I know the owner, or failed to try to find the owner when there was a possibility of doing so?

title: Justice
question: Have I deprived my family of a decent living by keeping my money for myself or foolishly spending it?

title: Justice
question: Have I, as executor or official representative of another in business matters, enriched myself or others by acting contrary to his know will, or refused to carry out his express will in distributing his goods?

title: Justice
question: Have I given short weight or measure in selling things to others, either to the extent of a grave amount on one occasion, or by cheating in small amounts regularly and continuously?

title: Justice
question: Have I charged a gravely exorbitant price for something because I knew that somebody would pay that much?

title: Justice
question: Have I lied about the quality of something I sold or exchanged, thus cheating another gravely?

title: Justice
question: have I enriched myself by paying gravely inadequate wages to those who worked for me?

title: Justice
question: Have I campaigned and conspired to prevent laborers from obtaining a living wage?

title: Justice
question: Have I cheated my employer by seriously neglecting the work I was hired to do?

title: Justice
question: Have I supported communists or racketeers in making unjust demands upon employers?

title: Justice
question: Have I cooperated in sabotage or the destruction of property because of labor disputes?

title: Justice
question: Have I cheated or deceived a partner in business so that there was a gravely unjust distribution of profits?

title: Justice
question: Have I bribed others to give me contracts to which I had no right, so that somebody was unjustly deprived of gain?

title: Justice
question: Have I taken bribes for the use of my authority either in business or public life, to giving unjust preferences or awards to others?

title: Justice
question: As an official of the people, have I accepted bribes on condition that I would permit evil or allow it to go unpunished?

title: Justice
question: Have I cheated in gambling, or offered fixed devices for gambling to others, thus winning valuable stakes to which I had no right?

title: Justice
question: Have I evaded paying any just and gave debt I had incurred?

title: Chastity
question: Have I deliberately taken delight in impure thoughts and images in my mind after I recognized them to be evil?

title: Chastity
question: Have I allowed my eyes to wander in curiosity over dangerous sexual objects?
description: The virtue of chastity is called the angelic virtue.
